features: [FABRIC DRAWERS BUT WOOD LOOK]: Compare with other fabric dresser,this white dresser organizers has water-resistant wood top and fabric drawers with leather front with wood grain,elegant look and easy to clean,removable plastic handle.

[TV STAND UP TO to 50"]: Overall dimension: 16.5"D x 42.1"W x 29.5"H.Drawer dimension: 15.2"D x 18.9"W x 7.4"H, each drawer support to 18 lbs,top wood support 50 lbs. This chest of drawers can also be used as a TV stand, is ideal for TV up to 50".

[FREE UP HOME SPACE DRESSER]:This White drawer dresser has a great size for normal nursery changing pad table. And larger capacity fits everywhere in your house for closets, bedrooms, nurseries, playrooms, entrance passages,office, living room etc.
[STRONG AND STURDY SYSTEM] : High quality steel frame,super easy to slide in and out but will not bend or fall down. space saving furniture.

[LIGHTWEIGHT AND EASY ASSEMBLE]: Easy to assemble in without 30 minutures,4 adjustable feet protect your floor from scratches. It's lightweight so you could move to any room you want to be tidier easily.

High-quality strong steel frame; Adjustable feet with plastic cover protect your floor. Steel frame ensure your drawer dresser more stable. Elegant Fax Leather Drawer Front The fabric drawer front is fax leather with wood grain in a elegant look, giving a classy and refined appeal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great and sturdy dresser for price.
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful and sturdy dresser for the price. I like the way the front has a faux wood grain, makes it look less cheap than other fabric drawer dressers. Drawers are nice and roomy. I swapped out the pull handles out to match baby crib. Super easy to assemble maybe took 30 minutes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's cute, easy to assemble and sturdy. However ... The faux leather isnt tight on the drawers so I'm left with these ugly wrinkles. I'm half tempted to return it and pay a little more for an actual drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It looks decent it fits a lot of clothes I just didn’t realize that it wasn’t completely wood it’s made of fabric the drawersI dindt read the description and for that it’s my own fault. It’s easy to put it together

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Got my money worth! Was super easy to put together, the instructions wasn’t confusing at all n they also give 1 extra tool for each piece in case you lose one of them and I love that! The only wood part of it is the top. Worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing dresser’s for a great price!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was super hesitant because I did not see any ratings for this product. I went ahead and order two and I am over the moon for how great this dresser is. We needed something practical for our 9 and 10y/o. This exceeded our expectations. Its sturdy and it looks just like the picture. It took about an hour for me to put both of them together. With that said, instructions we super easy to follow and it came with all the necessary tools and spare parts. Great buy for what we needed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Holds up good!! Has had 55” TV on top
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had this for about 5-6 month and it’s held up good. I use it in my daughters room to set her TV on and for her clothes. All the drawers are pretty full so considering that, the drawers aren’t perfect but I’m still pretty happy with it! Was easy to assemble. Easy to move (homes).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for baby nursery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks cheap, uneven and wobbles
reviews.reviewText: It doesn't look like the picture, the "white" looks pretty washed out. Stood perfect for two days, started wobbling randomly and wont "go back" to normal no matter how much I tightened or redo the assembly. Was gonna keep it even though it looks cheap, but the wobbles make it useless since it was bought to hold plant propagations in high water.
